name: Stephanie King
title: Cognitive Scientist | Software Engineer | Artist | Research Subject
tagline: Savant and human subject available for scientific research in neuro, cognitive, computation, and quantum labs
bio: Stephanie King is a savant and cognitive scientist available as a human subject for scientific research in neuroscience, cognitive science, computational neuroscience, and quantum cognition laboratories.

breakthrough.title: Mental Rotation Paradox
breakthrough.description: Resolved the Mental Rotation Paradox in cognitive scienceâ€”invalidating the allocentric model of spatial cognition, a theoretical framework that failed to constrain mental rotation despite decades of acceptance in the field.
breakthrough.details: This breakthrough addresses a fundamental paradox in how humans process spatial information and challenges prevailing cognitive science orthodoxy through comprehensive computational analysis of 50+ years of research literature (280+ papers, 1970-present).

research_methods: Systematic review methodology, citation analysis, computational social science, experimental design, and rigorous quantitative analysis combining academic-quality methodology with production software practices.

publications.title: The Surreal Art of Mental Rotation
